name: Road Crossing
description:
Road Crossing is the typical game where your character must cross streets infinitely without being hit or bumping into any obstacle in the attempt.
Road Crossing is the perfect game to hang out in a relaxed way, without being a game with great difficulty and to train your reflexes a bit.

The rules are a bit different from what games of this type are normally, since the frog you will drive can go in any of the 4 directions, forward, backward, right and left. This allows you to go back in case you got into a mess going forward.

How to play:

You simply need the mouse to play, with the mouse you will move through the menus and play. The address you click on will be the direction the frog will go.
